QuestData.Title: The Laboratory of Mardivas
QuestData.Description: <Several pages are devoted to notes on an experiment, a hastily written journal entry follows.>$b$bAt last, my research into the base elements has begun to bear fruit!$b$bWith careful application of the right base reagents and some arcane power I've managed to combine the essence of the elements in such a way as to create life!$b$bFurther investigation will be needed to determine what the various mixes of the elements will yield.$b$b<The writing ends here.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Activate the Elemental Essence Amalgamator in Mardivas's Laboratory.
